name: Nail AR
description:
With Nail AR you can now nail like it was for real. Use your device like a virtual hammer.

Don't wait till your next trip to some mountain hut. Use Nail AR whenever you need to nail down something.

Nail together with a friend using the multi-player feature. The better wins.

The app has 5 game modes - from the very beginner up to the chef nailer.

BABY NAILING
EASY NAILING
JUST NAILING
HARD NAILING
MEGA NAILING

First train yourself in nailing without time limits, then try playing against time. Check out the settings menu. You will find some useful configuration options like the sensitivity of the hammer or the direction of light. Timing options can be configured as well.

The multi-player mode is the most funny part, but it needs some guidance and practice level. You need to be two persons with each having the "Nail AR" app installed on its device. Start or reset the App. Then you put both devices next by next, so that they view almost the same image trough the camera feed. Select multi-player on both devices and wait until the pairing process finishes (give it 10 seconds). Press the Game button on one device and the it will start on both. Start Hammering. The better player wins the match.

As always we wish you a lot of fun with this AR experience.
